name: Classical Chinese
description: An introduction to Classical Chinese language with emphasis on grammatical analysis, reading literary texts and translation/contextualization into modern Chinese and English. This course examines pre-Qin Chinese classics, such the Analects of Confucius, the Mencius, the Dao De Jing, the Art of War, and some other philosophical maxims, literary quotations, idioms, poems, and prose. [36L]
prerequisites: CHI301Y OR adequate reading knowledge of Chinese as determined by department assessment questionnaire.
